message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This offer includes all the features you're looking for and more. Let me know if this aligns with your budget and expectations.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on this product, I'm really looking to stay under $8,000.  I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of that, I am proposing a counteroffer of $9,000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our respective positions while still allowing us to maintain a fair valuation for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
